subject: Baseball
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola is replacing Pepsi as Citi Field’s soft-drink sponsor, and a celebration of the deal at the New York Stock Exchange could be viewed as a small sign of corporate recovery for the Mets.
snippet: Coca-Cola is replacing Pepsi as Citi Field’s soft-drink sponsor, and a celebration of the deal at the New York Stock Exchange could be viewed as a small sign of corporate recovery for the Mets.
